title: manual_land_preparation_weed_clearing
summary: Manual grass clearing activity to prepare planting area at MaMeeFarm.
description: This record documents a manual land preparation activity at MaMeeFarm. The image shows MaMee clearing grass using a hand tool to prepare soil for future vegetable planting. The activity takes place under direct sunlight and reflects real agricultural labor conducted as part of daily farm operations.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
